Channel.Description: Receive automatic notifications whenever new maintenance patches are released from Autodesk.

Patch.PatchDesc: This Product Update 12 will update Autodesk 3dsMax 2012 English. The Release Notes contains the latest information regarding the installation and use of this Product Update. It is strongly recommended that you read the entire document before you apply the Product Update to your product.

Channel.Description: Autodesk Subscription Members: Receive announcements and subscription program news.

message.Name: Store and share your documents with Autodesk® Cloud.
message.Description: Autodesk® Subscription now provides a greater advantage with Autodesk® Cloud capabilities that can help you increase mobility, improve collaboration, and optimize your designs—advancing the way you work.
message.TargetURL: http://webservices.autodesk.com/redirector/cc/17963290?country=Australia&language=&product=Autodesk® 3ds Max® 2012&channel=Subscription Announcements&name=Store and share your documents with Autodesk® Cloud.

message.Name: Happy 20th Anniversary 3ds Max! Come celebrate with us and take a journey through time.
